title: S2 Ep29: The true cost of emissions cheating
itunes:title: The true cost of emissions cheating
description: Supposedly 'green' diesel engines with devices to cheat emissions tests have been polluting as much as 150 ordinary cars. Hannes Schwandt tell Tim Phillips about the staggering human cost of VW's fraud.
itunes:author: VoxTalks
dc:creator: VoxTalks
